alert.note: Alert for Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 4:48PM CDT until June 11 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SALINE COUNTY... At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of Friend, or 18 miles south of Seward, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dorchester. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
